title: Untitled, illustration to Heinrich Heine's poem "Where?" ("Wo?") (border, 5th song, folio 43) from the periodical Der Bildermann, supplement to vol. 1, no. 9 (Aug 1916)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 11 7/16 x 8 1/4" (29 x 21 cm); page: 14 x 11" (35.5 x 28 cm)
